sentences.english: Conclusion The cardiac functional effect of doxofylline are weaker than that of aminophylline.
sentences.chinese: 結論多索茶鹼對患者心功能的影響較氨茶鹼弱。

sentences.english: Conclusion The cardiac functional effect of doxofylline are weaker than that of aminophylline.
sentences.chinese: 結論多索茶鹼對患者心功能的影響較氨茶鹼弱。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the plasma concentration of aminophylline, and design the individuation project.
sentences.chinese: 目的測定氨茶鹼血藥濃度，並設計個體化給藥方案。

sentences.english: It contain no caffeine and theine, so you can feel relieved to drink the tea.
sentences.chinese: 不含咖啡因和茶鹼，讓您放心使用。

sentences.english: The most common adverse reaction was urorrhagia.
sentences.chinese: 茶鹼最常見的不良反應是多尿。

sentences.english: To establish a method for determination of formic acid residue in theophylline.
sentences.chinese: 建立了二類溶劑甲酸在茶鹼中殘留的檢測方法。

sentences.english: Caffeine is the single most widely consumed drug in the world.
sentences.chinese: 茶鹼是單人房在世界上最廣泛地消耗藥。

sentences.english: The objective was to prepare the diprophylline double-layer tablet and study the factors affecting its dissolubility in vitro.
sentences.chinese: 研製了二羥丙茶鹼雙層片並考察其體外釋藥特徵。
